'''18w47a''' is the seventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.14]], released on November 21, 2018<ref name=18w47a>{{snap|18w47a|November 21, 2018}}</ref>, which introduces [[pillager outpost]]s and [[raid]]s.

== Additions ==
=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Pillager Outpost.png|32px]] [[Pillager outpost]]s'''
* Are structures related to pillagers, separate from [[illager patrol]]s.
* Spawn [[pillager]]s.
* They have loot chests at the top, and minor structures around the main tower.
* Can be found in any [[biome]] a [[village]] can be generated in.
* Use the [[jigsaw block]] for generation.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Raid]]s'''
* Triggered when a [[player]] inflicted with [[Bad Omen]] enters a [[village]].
* [[Pillager]]s, [[vindicator]]s, [[evoker]]s, [[witch]]es and [[illager beast]]s can appear as part of the raids.
* Raid progress bar once a village has been entered is displayed like the ender dragon health bar, decreases on pillager kills.
** Shows remaining mobs near the end.
* Mobs appear in waves if effect has higher level.
** Include witches and evokers on later waves.

'''[[Status effect]]s'''
* [[Bad Omen]]
** Acquired by killing an illager patrol leader (an illager wearing a banner on its head).

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Texture Update|Texture changes]]'''
* Changed the textures of all [[log]]s, [[planks]],<ref>{{tweet|jappa|1065288860786143232|Check out planks & logs! Let me know what you think.|November 21, 2018}}</ref> [[Block of Gold|gold]] and [[diamond block]]s, [[glowstone]], [[nether bricks]], [[red sand]] and [[red sandstone]], as well as other blocks.<ref name="comparison">{{link|url=https://texturecomparison.myportfolio.com/|title=Minecraft 1.14 / 1.13 Texture Comparison|website=texturecomparison.myportfolio.com}}</ref>
* Minor changes to regular, mossy, cracked, and chiseled [[stone bricks]]; and [[wheat crops]].<ref name="comparison" />

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Vindicator]]s'''
* Now break down doors during raids.

'''[[Illager beast]]s'''
* Now spawn in raids.

'''[[Witch]]es'''
* No longer attack each other.<ref>{{bug|MC-248071|Witches no longer attack each other after 1.14 - Work As Intended}}</ref>

=== World generation ===
'''[[Illager patrol]]s'''
* Are less common.

=== Commands ===
'''{{cmd|locate}}'''
* Can locate pillager outposts.
